title: 'At the movies': Tim Burton masterclass with Margaret Pomeranz

abstract: Tim Burton is interviewed by Margaret Pomeranz as part of the ABC program 'At the movies'. The masterclass was filmed at ACMI to coincide with the opening of 'Tim Burton: the exhibition'.
description: Hosted by Margaret Pomeranz, this masterclass reveals the workings behind Tim Burton's creative genius, offering insight into his creative process with a rare view into his world of melancholic misfits, gothic suburbia and contemporary fairytales.
